```
$ for f in *.gz; do echo -----$f-----; cat $f | gunzip | grep -a 'const.*TheVersion.*go1.6rc1'; done

	const @"runtime/internal/sys".TheVersion = "go1.6rc1"
	const @"".TheVersion = "go1.6rc1"
const TheVersion = `go1.6rc1`
```
